original_text: And these shall be the measures thereof; the north side four thousand and five hundred, and the south side four thousand and five hundred, and on the east side four thousand and five hundred, and the west side four thousand and five hundred.
korean_text: 그 크기는 북쪽도 사천오백 척이요 남쪽도 사천오백 척이요 동쪽도 사천오백 척이요 서쪽도 사천오백 척이며

sentences.original_text: And these shall be measures thereof;
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이것들이 그것의 척도가 될 것이다;

sentences.original_text: north side four thousand and five hundred,
and south side four thousand and five hundred,
and on east side four thousand and five hundred,
and west side four thousand and five hundred.
